zeta
Class ZetaInfo

java.lang.Object
  zeta.ZetaInfo
public class ZetaInfo
extends java.lang.Object

The ZetaInfo class writes information in the specified log file 'info.log' and the event log file. There is also a usual roll over behaviour of log files.
